channel.title: FIXED! Error: Could not find or load main class Gui (Client Side)
channel.description:
Hello, I just got a new computer and want to continue developing my server on it. I took the servers files off my other computer and put them on this one, changed the Run.bat to my newest version of Java (i will put code below) and i get this error. "Error: Could not find or load main class Gui" I have recompiled,and yes, i have a class and java of Gui. Also, when i put the files back on my old computer, they loaded and worked perfectly. Any help is appreciated Thank you in advance.
[code]@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause [/code]
EDIT: The webclient that I made loads perfectly fine on my new computer, but it still will not load the run.bat
EDIT 2 i fixed it. add "-cp .;" without the quotations before the Gui part of your run.bat ex: [code]title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .; Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause[/code]

item.title: FIXED! Error: Could not find or load main class Gui (Client Side)
item.dc:creator: @Ian1045 Ian1045
item.description:
@Ian1045 wrote:

Thank you so much! Works like a charm!

item.title: FIXED! Error: Could not find or load main class Gui (Client Side)
item.dc:creator: @deathbysniper97 deathbysniper97
item.description:
@deathbysniper97 wrote:

Hello,
I just got a new computer and want to continue developing my server on it. I took the servers files off my other computer and put them on this one, changed the Run.bat to my newest version of Java (i will put code below) and i get this error. “Error: Could not find or load main class Gui”
I have recompiled,and yes, i have a class and java of Gui.
Also, when i put the files back on my old computer, they loaded and worked perfectly.
Any help is appreciated
Thank you in advance.

@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

EDIT:
The webclient that I made loads perfectly fine on my new computer, but it still will not load the run.bat

EDIT 2
i fixed it. add “-cp .;” without the quotations before the Gui part of your run.bat
ex:

title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .; Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

Read full topic
